Personally Speaking with Msgr Jim Lisante
http://http://ccc.usccb.org/cccradio/PersonallySpeaking
Personally Speaking with Msgr Jim Lisante Audio component to television program of the same name that features prominent people from the worlds of entertainment, religion, politics, sports, journalism, and literature.
Audio component to television program of the same name that features prominent people from the worlds of entertainment, religion, politics, sports, journalism, and literature.

religion, politics, sports, journalism, literature, Msgr Lisante, entertainment famous, personally speaking, USCCB
Program 246 Antonio Monda, Tom Grace http://www.usccb.org/ccc/psradio.shtml http://ccc.usccb.org/cccradio/PersonallySpeaking/2011/PersonallySpeaking_Program246.mp3 New York Yankees' first baseman Mark Teixeira reveals the roots of his Catholic faith and love of baseball. Suspense novelist Dean Koontz discusses his Catholic faith and the way in which he was able to forgive his father for the abusive way he acted throughout his life.
Featured This Week
New York Yankees' first baseman Mark Teixeira reveals the roots of his Catholic faith and love of baseball. Suspense novelist Dean Koontz discusses his Catholic faith and the way in which he was able to forgive his father for the abusive way he acted throughout his life.
Podcasts Sun, 16 Jan 2011 10:00:00 ET
00:29:24 digitalmedia@usccb.org No
